content: {"name": "Bright Hope Baptist Community Kitchen ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "If there is a special need re: family and they recommended by a state\u2019s office or representative our office is open from 10:00 am to 2 pm (Mondays to Fridays).\n\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.brighthopebaptist.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1601 North 12th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19122", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.977478, "longitude": -75.153854}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 232-6004", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will be given a Pantry ID upon registration"}]}
